sentences.english: Ahern to get some cabinet members and party colleagues behind, ride out the storm.

sentences.english: Among other benefits, the disposal of rubbish supports the medical profession.
sentences.chinese: 在其他的好处中，有一项是垃圾处理力挺了医学界。
